Module org.example.scdpro2
Package org.example.scdpro2.ui.views.PackageDiagram

Class PackageDiagramPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
org.example.scdpro2.ui.views.PackageDiagram.PackageDiagramPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class PackageDiagramPane extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
Represents the pane that holds and manages the package diagram components. This class provides methods for adding, removing, and managing the relationships between package and class boxes within the diagram.

  • Property Summary

      Parameters:

      Returns:
